tos_section1_line1: • Registration Requirement: Users must provide accurate and complete information to create an account. Any false information may lead to account suspension.
tos_section1_line2: • Email/Phone Verification: We require email or phone number verification to ensure user authenticity and system security.
tos_section1_line3: • Age Policy: The service is intended only for individuals 18 years of age or older, or 13 and older with parental/guardian consent.
tos_section2_line1: • Free Plan: Provides access to basic features, including limited public event rooms and restricted random language matching.
tos_section2_line2: • Plus Plan: Offers premium benefits such as unlimited access to private events, priority matching, and an ad-free experience.
tos_section3_line1: • Event Room Capacity: The maximum number of participants in event rooms is capped to ensure interaction quality.
tos_section3_line2: • Event Verification: Users creating events must have a verified profile. PolyGo reserves the right to moderate or delete inappropriate events.
tos_section3_line3: • Entry Verification: Certain events may require additional verification or approval from the organizer to join.
tos_section3_line4: • Call Duration: The duration of random video/voice calls may be limited under the Free Plan.
tos_section3_line5: • Matching Rules: The matching system is based on interests, languages, and learning goals. Abuse of the matching feature is prohibited.
tos_section3_line6: • Event Cancellation: Users must give 24 hours' notice to cancel a created event. Late cancellations may incur penalties.
tos_section4_line1: • Plus Plan Billing Cycle: Plus Plan subscriptions are billed monthly or annually and will automatically renew unless canceled.
tos_section4_line2: • Balance Requirement: Users must maintain a valid balance to access paid services. No refunds are provided for fees already paid.
tos_section5_line1: • Content Moderation: PolyGo reserves the right to review, edit, or remove any content deemed inappropriate or in violation of terms.
tos_section5_line2: • Violation Reporting: Users are required to immediately report any behavior or content that violates the Terms of Service.
tos_section5_line3: • Activity Logging: We log user activity for security, analysis, and moderation purposes.
tos_section5_line4: • Admin Authority: PolyGo administrators have the absolute authority to suspend or terminate violating accounts without prior notice.
tos_section6_line1: • Data Protection Compliance: We comply with data protection regulations in handling your personal information. See the Privacy Policy for details.
tos_section6_line2: • Information Sharing: Personal information is not shared with third parties without your consent, except as required by law.
pp_section1_line1: • Personal Information: We collect information you provide directly, including your name, email, password (encrypted), native language, and language you wish to learn.
pp_section1_line2: • Usage Information: We automatically collect information about how you access and use the Service, including interaction logs, IP address, and device type.
pp_section1_line3: • Communication Data: To ensure safety and content moderation, we may record or analyze text messages and video/voice call logs.
pp_section1_line4: • Payment Information: Payment information (e.g., credit card details) is processed by our secure payment partners and is not stored directly by PolyGo.
pp_section2_line1: • Service Provision: To operate and maintain the Service, including matching learners and managing communication events.
pp_section2_line2: • Experience Improvement: To understand how users use the Service and develop new features, products, and services.
pp_section2_line3: • AI Support: Some communication data (anonymized) may be used to train and improve our AI/Machine Learning models.
pp_section2_line4: • Security and Safety: To prevent fraud, abuse, and other illegal activities, and to maintain the safety and integrity of the Service.
pp_section3_line1: • No Third-Party Sharing: We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal information with third parties for their own marketing purposes.
pp_section3_line2: • Service Providers: We may share data with trusted third-party service providers (e.g., hosting, analytics) only as necessary for them to perform their functions.
pp_section3_line3: • Legal Requirements: We may disclose your information if required to comply with the law or to respond to valid government requests.
pp_section4_line1: • Right to Access: You have the right to request copies of the personal data we hold about you.
pp_section4_line2: • Right to Edit: You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate or incomplete.
pp_section4_line3: • Right to Delete: You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, subject to our legal obligations.
pp_section4_line4: • Right to Data Portability: You have the right to receive your personal data in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format.
pp_section5_line1: • Data Encryption: We use SSL/TLS encryption to protect data in transit and encrypt sensitive data (like passwords) at rest.
pp_section5_line2: • Payment Security: All payment transactions are handled by PCI DSS compliant payment gateways and are not processed on PolyGo's own servers.
pp_section5_line3: • Access Control: Access to user data is strictly limited to employees with a genuine business need.
pp_section5_line4: • Security Monitoring: We continuously monitor our systems for vulnerabilities and potential attacks.
pp_section6_line1: • Essential Cookies: These cookies are strictly necessary for you to navigate the website and use its features, such as accessing secure areas.
pp_section6_line2: • Analytics Cookies: We use third-party cookies (like Google Analytics) to collect information about how you interact with our Service to improve performance.
pp_section6_line3: • Cookie Management: You can manage or decline cookies in your browser settings, though this may affect the functionality of the Service.
pp_section7_line1: • Retention Period: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy.
pp_section7_line2: • Account Deletion: Upon account deletion, we will delete or anonymize your personal information, except for information we must retain due to legal obligations.
pp_section7_line3: • Legal Retention: Data may be retained for longer periods if required to comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, or enforce our agreements.
pp_section8_line1: • Age Restriction: PolyGo does not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 13. If you believe we have such information, please contact us.
pp_section8_line2: • Child Protection: If we become aware that we have collected personal data from a child under 13 without verifiable parental consent, we will take steps to remove that information.
pp_section9_line1: • Notification of Changes: We may update this policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new Policy and updating the 'Last Updated' date.
pp_section9_line2: • Acceptance of Changes: Your continued use of the Service after any changes become effective constitutes your acceptance of the revised Policy.
